attributes.action: recognise the act of abortion as akin to the crime of murder in cases other than those in which the woman's life is threatened, the woman is a victim of rape or the unborn child has been identified as possessing traits of potentially hindering or life-threatening mental or physical handicaps. We therefore demand the prohibition of abortion except under the aforementioned circumstances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
